opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Cook County, Illinois v. United States Ex Rel. Chandler

opinion:
537 U.S. 1086

COOK COUNTY, ILLINOIS
v.
UNITED STATES EX REL. CHANDLER.

No. 01-1572.

Supreme Court of United States.

December 16, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE SEVENTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 7th Cir. [Certiorari granted, 536 U. S. 956.] Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
